column4: Hi, I opened the System Monitor and I can see that 1.3GB is being taken by Ubuntu but I've got hardly anything running. A "top" does show basically no activity. Where is the memory being "eaten"?
Are you saying that Ubuntu is caching like mad?
no i am saying memory not used is memory wasted.
that's a firewall, it would appear I don't want a firewall
you can reach your web server from same machine using : http://localhost  ?
then you need to open a port
Do I do that on Ubuntu
sorry im really tired and my paitence is really thin... read this page : https://help.ubuntu.com/9.04/serverguide/C/firewall.html
One question I have is: my current ufw is inactive. Will that cause all inbound traffic to be denied?
